Description: The Shin Series guitars feature the Ravelle body shape, with amazing and exclusive Japanese paintbrush art, achieving top-notch tone with only the finest wood available. A solid mahogany body and neck with a 22-fret ebony fingerboard, Locking tuners, Tune-O-Matic bridge w/stop tailpiece, Graph Tech TUSQ XL Nut, Abalone inlays, and black hardware. Loaded with a Seymour Duncan JB in bridge position, and a Seymour Duncan ‘59 in the neck. Ive owned this guitar for a couple years I bought from Fernandes themselves and it was one of the last Ravelle Shin Demon guitars left that I could find and has a hard case. This guitar has never left the house I dont smoke or gig so the guitar is in fantastic condition and plays like a dream. Ive seen a few of these online in the past and the average price is $1600 and most of the time if you can find one its not the Ravelle Demon model the art work is awesome these are one of a kind shape and look.
Title: Fernandes Limited Edition Ravelle Shin Series Guitar
